api_list.name: Get song by title
api_list.description: Get a song by its title

api_list.name: Get songs by author
Get album
Get songs by composer
api_list.description: Get all songs by composer of the melody.

api_list.name: Get song by ID
api_list.description: Get a song by its ID
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://kjoller.p.rapidapi.com/songs/1"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "kjoller.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://kjoller.p.rapidapi.com/songs/{id}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "kjoller.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
